lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because:
It’s time for a humanitarian revolution. The great advancements society has made in the past in other areas must now be made in the area of human dignity. 

It’s time to eliminate extreme poverty and all it’s horrible implications.

Now, more than ever, this revolution is possible.

We don’t lack resources, only will. 
We don’t lack ability, only determination. 
We don’t lack opportunities, only action.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a website that sells magnet mailers.

lenders.name: Danelle
lenders.loan_because: someone gave me a great gift certificate and I wanted to pass it along!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people organize their finances so they can budget and plan better, pay bills on time, and save for special goals.

lenders.name: Glenn
lenders.occupational_info: I do Video production, editing, motion graphics as a full time job and a part time freelance.

lenders.name: Tennessee Family

lenders.occupational_info: We are blessed to  take care of the sick and injured.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: Because I can

lenders.loan_because: I want to help
